section.title: Create a JFace TableViewer for the Todo items
section.para: In this exercise you create a JFace table in the TodoOverviewPart class which displays the Todo items.

section.title: Add dependencies
section.para: Ensure that the org.eclipse.jface plug-in is available as a dependency to the com.example.e4.rcp.todo plug-in. You might have added this dependency already in another exercise.

section.title: Create implementation
section.para: Create a JFace table implementation with the summary and description fields as table columns.
Your part should still have the "Load Data" button. Load the data into the viewer once this button is pressed.
